title: An Unexpected Blessing
description: Since his parents' tragic deaths, little JT had been cared for by his maternal aunt, Dori Morales. His long-lost paternal uncle, Chase Garrett, wanted to be a positive influence in his life. And his paternal grandfather wanted him raised with everything wealth and privilege could buy.Caring for his nephew was Chase's way of making up for his fractured relationship with his brother â€” and a marriage of convenience to Dori just might prevent the nasty custody battle that loomed....
author: Merrillee Whren
